value.verse: I saw no temple in the city, *
value.halfverse: for its temple is the God of surpassing strength and the Lamb.
for the glory of God shines on it, and its lamp is the Lamb.
value.verse: And the city has no need of sun or moon to light it, *

value.halfverse: and the rulers of the world lay their honor and glory there.
value.verse: By its light the nations shall walk, *

value.halfverse: into it they will bring the honor and glory of nations.
value.verse: Its gates shall never be shut by day, nor shall there be any night; *

value.halfverse: flowing from the throne of God and of the Lamb.
value.verse: I saw the clean river of the water of life, bright as crystal, *

value.halfverse: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of nations.
value.verse: The tree of life spanned the river, giving fruit every month, *

value.halfverse: there they will see Godâ€™s face, whose Name shall be on their foreheads.
value.verse:
All curses cease where the throne of God and the Lamb stands,
and all servants give worship there; *

metadata.localname: A Song of the Heavenly City
